other_tests.findings: Fibroblastic proliferation associated with a collagenous stroma, with varied growth patterns and an absence of elastic fibers.
Fibroblastic proliferation characterized by long fascicles of fibroblasts in a collagenous stroma, with myofibroblastic differentiation in immunohistochemical staining.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Progression of cutaneous nodules and arthritis was noted despite treatment.

other_tests.findings: Paucicellular proliferation of bland spindle cells in the reticular dermis, with absence of elastic fibers.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Increased erosive changes noted in radiographs compared to previous studies.

other_tests.findings: Paucicellular dermal proliferation of randomly arranged fibroblasts in a densely collagenous stroma, loss of elastic fibers observed.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Resolution of all cutaneous nodules after treatment with interferon-alfa and ribavirin; joint symptoms remained stable.
